about_the_game:
A NEW ADVENTURE

The Outbound Ghost: Reborn is a new entry in the universe of The Outbound Ghost that follows an alternate timeline.

Collect Figments of your imagination to do combat against other spirit wielders in an improved combat system where strategizing is everything.

A NEW STORY

Experience a whole new story focused entirely on The Ghost that takes you through new areas of Outbound never seen before, and pits you against The Bound One, as seen in Soul Stalker.

For the first time in the series, build a relationship with your Figments, and work together to bring down the being that is responsible for purgatory itself.

KEY FEATURES

  • OVERHAULED COMBAT | Reborn's combat features many improvements over the original game's including replenishing SP, type matchups, and a reworked equipment system.

  • THE GHOST'S ADVENTURE | Experience a new story that has you play as one protagonist throughout the whole game. Learn about yourself through talking to your inner demons - your Figments.

  • OUTBOUND LOCATIONS | Use the new train stations to travel between areas, many of which are entirely new to the series.

  • A PAPERY WORLD | Experience the remastered visual style that makes use of cel shading, in combination with the classic paper-flat characters.

ENTIRELY FREE*

*The Outbound Ghost: Reborn will be entirely free to you if you own the original The Outbound Ghost game on Steam before the new game comes out in 2025. Purchase The Outbound Ghost now and get two full adventures for the price of one!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: The Outbound Ghost: Reborn is a turn-based Creature Collector where the monsters you use are ghostly figments of your imagination. Experience a new supernatural story with overhauled gameplay in this sequel to The Outbound Ghost.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
